name: spotify-listening-stats-recommender
description: AI-powered music recommendation website based on Spotify listening stats

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd starter-appwrite && npm run dev" "npm run dev -w backend"
scripts.dev:react: concurrently "npm run dev -w frontend" "npm run dev -w backend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w frontend && npm run build -w backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w frontend && npm run lint -w backend
scripts.test: npm run test -w frontend && npm run test -w backend
